required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of an Endometrioma on Oocyte Quality
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of an Endometrioma on Oocyte Quality

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate if there are differences in oocyte quality depending on whether these oocytes come from an ovary in contact with an endometrioma.

detailed_description.textblock:
There is no consensus for whether an endometrioma influences oocyte quality, as well as the possible mechanisms that induce them.
In this study, the oocyte maturation will proof oocyte quality: This mean, the percentage of oocytes in metaphase II obtained after stimulation, as well as the rate of oocytes fertilized in direct contact with an endometrioma.

primary_outcome.description: Number of MII oocytes from the total of cumulus granulosa cell-oocyte complex by 100
Number of oocytes with pronuclear activation after ICSI procedure from the total oocytes microinjected by 100

arm_group.description: No drugs are administered. It is an observational study. Collect retrospectively data
No drugs are administered. It is an observational study. Collect retrospectively data

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients <40 years, BMI <30kg / m2,
Exclusion Criteria:

reference.citation: Garcia-Velasco JA, Mahutte NG, Corona J, Zúñiga V, Gilés J, Arici A, Pellicer A. Removal of endometriomas before in vitro fertilization does not improve fertility outcomes: a matched, case-control study. Fertil Steril. 2004 May;81(5):1194-7.
Garrido N, Navarro J, Remohí J, Simón C, Pellicer A. Follicular hormonal environment and embryo quality in women with endometriosis. Hum Reprod Update. 2000 Jan-Feb;6(1):67-74. Review.

Filippi F, Benaglia L, Paffoni A, Restelli L, Vercellini P, Somigliana E, Fedele L. Ovarian endometriomas and oocyte quality: insights from in vitro fertilization cycles. Fertil Steril. 2014 Apr;101(4):988-93.e1. doi: 10.1016/j.fertnstert.2014.01.008. Epub 2014 Mar 3.
